data.name: Soulfly
data.detailed_description:
SOULFLY is an exciting, Parkour & FPS style game featuring you as the exceptional who won’t be held down by the system. He will stop at nothing to overthrow the system.

    Soulfly is a physics-based adventure that tests gaming skills set in a mysterious dystopia. You have a vengeance to take from the zen company that is ruling the world and driving people to hunger. You have infiltrated this company building and you are alone.You have to trust your weapons skills and intellect. Good luck.!

  • USE THE PHYSICS SYSTEM

    All items and weapons work with the physics system in the zen skyscraper. Use your mind and talent and find a way to cross the floors.

  • DESTROY CRUEL SOLDIERS

    Each floor of this skyscraper is guarded by highly skilled special guards and heavy weapons. Trust your physics abilities and use them.


  • SOLVE THE MYSTERY

    You have infiltrated the Zen company's administration skyscrapper and now you are on your own, and completely different mysteries and experiments will be waiting for you on every floor. You have to put up with what you see.

data.short_description: SOULFLY is an exciting, Parkour & FPS style game featuring you as the exceptional who won’t be held down by the system. He will stop at nothing to overthrow the system.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: dual core 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel hd 520
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Video preset :Lowest(720p) I 60fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit | Windows 8.1 64-bit | Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: intel core i5 4700 | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 | AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Video preset :Lowest(720p) I 120fps
